item.title: 4 Candles in the Advent Wreath
item.description: Print the colored posters for each week of Advent to say the prayers with your family when you light the candles of the Advent Wreath.

item.title: 7 Mansions of the Interior Castle
item.description: October 15th is Saint Teresa of Avilaâ€™s feast day. In her book, The Interior Castle, she compares the soul with an analogy of a great castle with seven mansions.
